_description: The work of the saints — four monorhyming lines

CamPeter134.Transcription:
ffor þe temple halwyngffor our insufficiens schewyngffor
                    our necligens excusyngffor our nede releuyng
CamPeter134.Note:
Folio number is second k.8, but should be t.8; on a page on which begins
                    a sermon for All Saints’ Day, de omnibus sanctis sermo
                    primus.
CamPeter134.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes. 
             A Descriptive Catalogue of the Manuscripts in the Library of Peterhouse
                College, Cambridge.
         Cambridge: at the UP, 1899: 161.
